Company: FCStone, LLC and Commodity Operations Inc.

Description: The Commodity Futures Trading Commission issued an order filing and settling charges against FCStone Merchant Services LLC for entering into multiple noncompetitive trades and against INTL FCStone Financial Inc., a registered Futures Commission Merchant based in Chicago, for reporting non-bona fide prices to the Chicago Mercantile Exchange (CME) between December 2013 and March 2014.
